mapper.select: SELECT oq.id, oq.order_id, oq.staff_id, oq.price, oq.content, oq.create_date, oi.code, oi.order_name, oi.goods_type, oi.images, oi.weight, oi.height, oi.width, oi.remark, si.name AS staffName, si.phone AS staffPhone, si.images AS staffImages, ui.name AS userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images AS userImages FROM order_quotation oq left join staff_info si on (si.id = oq.staff_id) left join order_info oi on (oi.id = oq.order_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where 1 = 1 order by oq.create_date desc

SELECT oq.id, oq.order_id, oq.staff_id, oq.price, oq.content, oq.create_date, oi.code, oi.order_name, oi.goods_type, oi.images, oi.weight, oi.height, oi.width, oi.remark, si.name AS staffName, si.phone AS staffPhone, si.images AS staffImages, ui.name AS userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images AS userImages FROM order_quotation oq left join staff_info si on (si.id = oq.staff_id) left join order_info oi on (oi.id = oq.order_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) where 1 = 1 AND oq.order_id = #{orderId} order by oq.create_date desc
